title: What are the most common business to business transactions at this point in time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bank transfers are the most popular in B2B. Reputable companies rely on payment providers that proved themselves in the market. Such providers help customers to make seamless and fast transfers. Ikajo is one of such companies. This PSP has been operating more than 15 years and has 14,000 successfully implemented projects around the globe. Should you want to learn more about Ikajo, check its solutions.
